text: Benford Milo "Ben" Gardner (October 18, 1919 – May 13, 1985) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Fort Wayne Zollner Pistons and Anderson Duffey Packers in the National Basketball League during the 1946–47 season and averaged 0.4 points per game. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1985 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Anderson Packers players Category:Basketball players from Texas Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Fort Wayne Zollner Pistons players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Professional Basketball League of America players Category:Sam Houston State Bearkats men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Houston
